body: Yeah I think so too chapter 12 will be about Kise's PoV. Jacking off while crying peeping them having sex lol. Author will milk the shit out of this series till 30+ chapters like rarefure.
My bet is that ch 12 is gonna be about Kise cry fapping while watching the protags have sex. Then it will end with him going mad and planning to blackmail the FMC.
I suspect the NTR tag the author put on hiw sales page is meant for Kise himself, or it will turn into blackmail arc. This may be a turning point for how this series will go from here on.
Lol imagine the face of Kise while peeping them having sex what a cuck. Hope we get to see an actual development of the story. Enough teasing author.

Google translate of summary of ch 12 [ "Itai Amai Episode 12"
Kise has seen Amuro entering Suma's room.
Standing alone in the darkness of the night, what he sees is the silhouette of two loved ones seen through the window through the window.]

Oh so it's gonna be a blackmail Ntr. That's Disappointing. Can someone kill the stalker classmate please.
Anyone notice the deadbydaylight Easter egg on page 12?
Patiently waiting for what happens in the next chapter is killing me
The type of series that makes u fully anxious while reading
Mfs writing whole essays

I really hope that what these people saying in the comments are correct. If this is just NTR bait, then good for the author baiting us. But if the story turns a 180 and the sensei ends up being cucked, then I'm gonna lose my mind. Hoping no blackmail will happen next chapter and Kise will just become a depresed cucked bitch.

What the fuck. Okay, I've always seen troupe in Vanilla doujins where everything vanilla and You fully EXPECT that to continue till the end and you feel safe. But then the last few pages the Author just drops the Girl's Kink or something and go out with a Gangbang enslavement Drug orgy and you just feel bad.

What I feel from this doujin is the exact same opposite. There's no comfort because every human is prejudice fuck but also because the way the Author writes the story. It brings out the insecurity of all people and shows what you are inside.

But don't let that distract you that the Komi-san fandom got a random Artist lynched by his neighbors and he got branded as a rapist and pedophile just because of a 'prank' report made that he owns child porn on his computer, then his two nieces who lost have no parents now goes to the orphanage because their uncle is now being branded as a sexual offender because of a prank of NTR hating Komi-fans when Artist drew for commission.

I used to think this series is retarded, which it definitely is, but it's also some of the best NTR bait that I've seen yet. It's clear that the story presents Kise as the fantasizing weirdo who thinks he's the alpha male when really he's the ultimate cuck. Each chapter makes you nervous on purpose because it's supposed to bring out the insecurity in retarded NTR readers. Quite genius, actually.

I think this is just a doujin to mock the NTR people. The author makes you feel like it's leading up to an NTR conclusion, at every step, but it never does. The Kise guy embodies the fans of NTR, they fantasies that they'll make the girl cheat on their partner, but they get NTRd themselves. It's an ironic tale, to mock the fans of the genre
@CommandThenConquer ong bro, it always makes me nervous after a reading a chapter
That Kise guy is probably jerking off looking at their silhouettes.
I do hope this doesn’t turn into some blackmail ntr bs, but honestly the way their other series turned out I wouldn’t be surprised either way.

The pattern here is teasing NTR at the end of almost every chapter with nothing actually happening or we the readers not knowing if something actually did. I think the story will continue with this pattern until the last few where it will only be Kise falling for it thinking he was her boyfriend all along. The sensei gets together completely with the girl up to the wedding day and as they say they're vows it focus's on the audience where their is a bunch of the random people with incredibly dark or smug knowing smiles to end the series with one final "Wait what!?" My guess
I've never been this nervous reading a fucking doujin
@roflfiend now that mention it… yeah, possibly

I suddenly understand after page 11. Kise will be the final cuck, the teacher is just bait for suspense and novelty. The story initially presents him as an alpha but he's actually just a cringe weirdo who constructs elaborate fantasies for himself. He's not even Ugly Bastard in disguise since he started getting off to Tsutsumi fucking Karin. Even if he blackmails her he'll just be some micropenis 1 pump, just watch. I still don't know if the teacher is getting cucked, but there will be a scene where Kise watches and ends up jacking off to Karin being sexually satisfied by another man/men. That's the author's payoff.
I just can't get over how cute Karin is.
ok so yeah I was wrong, NTR incoming

Seeing all the comments complaining about how this'll turn into NTR makes me hope that it does. Yall can't enjoy what's in front of you because you're too worried about what may come in the future. Shut up, and fap.
Who's that again? The two kissing in a room?

@alansmith20 i think that too, i think the author is baiting everyone and he makes us think this series is gonna be NTR when its not. So I hope its keeps like this and don't turn into NTR bs after this long time
@glad1985 agreed
If Kise will blackmail Karin in the next chapter. It would be funny if Kise has a micropenis and can't satisfy Karin lol. But damn Karin dumbness is full display here.
author did a really good job at making Kise creepy as fuck
Agreed with you completely @glad. but I dont think this author will do that. I think it's gonna be blackmail starting next chapter.

@glad1985 no that would of course end up as Real NTR like in pretty much all the long series from this author . ryoh really love to make huge build up for like 15-20 chapters before Unleashing the NTR part

Honestly, if it turns out to be actual NTR in the end, I will be really disappointed plainly from "artistic" standpoint. The idea of constant, unabashed NTR bait that always keeps you guessing but seemingly is all fake is way more fresh than NTR bait that turns into actual NTR. Especially since the author is known for NTR plots - not doing one would be the biggest, meta level, subversion of expectations.
Bro everytime i saw this name of this doujin its euphoria to me and im start to overthink if this is gonna be an ntr or not
But for if you compare this guy to other NTR protagonist his kinda look lame and weak😅😅😅 can he even satisfy that girl at this point🤣🤣🤣

boring baits we know its gonna happen anyway, this author does vanilla at first then changes it to ntr after 15 or 20 chapters

Don't be so sure about the NTR bait, it had high chance of becoming real. This isn't the first time author did NTR doujin. That guy already groped her, and blackmail material are a classic NTR starter. Added the fact that this story already shifting focus towards the other guy, with his fake girlfriend setup + natural FMC sluttiness, it's gonna be spicy (or bad if you're a vanillafag)
